## ACT data at a glance

```{r}
glimpse(df_act)
```

## ACT data summaries

```{r}
df_act %>%
  group_by(grade_level_id) %>%
  summarize(n = n(),
            mean_act_science = mean(science, na.rm = TRUE))
```


```{r}
df_act_attendees %>%
  filter(grade %in% c(10, 11, 12)) %>%
  group_by(student_number) %>%
  filter(science == max(science, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(grade) %>%
  summarize(n = n(),
            mean_act_science = mean(science, na.rm = TRUE))
```


```{r}
df_act_survey_takers %>%
  filter(grade_level %in% c(10, 11, 12)) %>%
  group_by(student_number) %>%
  filter(science == max(science, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(grade_level) %>%
  summarize(n = n(),
            mean_act_science = mean(science, na.rm = TRUE))
```
